segments.text: What are you doing here ? How about your resume now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I still have no idea what to do now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't act like this . Please have good thoughts in your mind . What's behind you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could not agree with you more . But I feel worried about what to do next as soon as I begin to write my resume .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is no need to do like this . We can surf the net and find some templates for resume .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds good . I will do it in a jiffy . OK ! Let's put our heads together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said it . We can also find some helpful advice from some experts .
segments.speaker: S1
